descriptions: Added a new config option: Config.Parcels.ParcelBombProbability to control the chance of a parcel being a bomb. Set to 0 to disable.
Peds can now retaliate during muggings by fighting back.
The talking meter in muggings now decreases faster, encouraging more interaction.
Improved overall performance with various optimizations.
Fixed cooldown issues with mailboxes and parking meters.
Resolved an issue with ox_target trying to register models before they were loaded.
Fixed police alerts being spammed during muggings.
